page.title: 15LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content:
Leisure facilities in this area of Gosport are excellent, catering for a wide variety of ages. We have St. Vincent Centre where the following activities are available: roller skating, table tennis, squash, badminton, football, netball, judo, karate, aerobics, tennis, swimming, indoor bowling, gymnastics, archery, trampolining, yoga and a camera club. Ladies are catered for at this centre with three recreational sessions and an available creche. Mums, toddlers and adult swimming courses, keep fit, handicrafts, flower arranging and cookery classes are available through the adult education authority.
{ }
